channel.description:
Nipe Story (Tell Me A Story)  is a fortnightly Kenyan podcast that gives a voice to written short stories.  This podcast is hosted by Kevin Mwachiro. @kevmwachiro
Karibu! Welcome.

item.description:
After the Credits Roll is inspired by the documentary film I Am Samuel  - the true story of  Samuel Imbaya, a Kenyan man torn between duty to his family and honesty about his sexuality and identity.  

After the Credits Roll is an original production by We are not the machine Ltd. Visit www.watchiamsamuel.org to learn about the true story behind this audio drama.
